product_name: Black Diamond Boundary Adjustable Ski Poles - Pair
long_description: The affordable Black Diamond Boundary Adjustable Ski Poles feature durable aluminum construction and secure, low-profile FlickLock(R) Pro mechanisms for reliable performance when you're touring. 2-piece lightweight aluminum shafts with FlickLock(R) Pro mechanisms allow you to adjust the length from 90 - 140cm. FlickLock Pro mechanisms are secure, fast and easy to use; low-profile stainless-steel design provides excellent clamping force and durability. Grips feature dual-density palm zones and aggressive hooking points for leveraging bindings and boot buckles. Freeride series straps hang open for easy access and distribute weight evenly across the wrists; ladder-lock buckles are simple to manipulate with gloves on. Black Diamond Boundary Adjustable Ski Poles come equipped with 4 in. wide powder baskets.
